definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import pilcvds ds.result = pilcvds.vmap(commonblock, "$(name)", "encoder_2", ds.$(name)_triggermode, ds.$(name)_nbtriggers, ds.$(name)_triggersperfile, "$(hostname)", "$(device)", "$var.filename", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$(__insname__)", ds.$(name)_fileprefix, ds.$(name)_filedir)
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_nbtriggers $datasources.$(name)_triggersperfile $datasources.$(name)_fileprefix $datasources.$(name)_filedir
